item.description:
Please join us for the 2nd Annual Inner Peace Festival on Saturday, June 2nd from 10am to 2pm at Wooster Square Park, across from the Farmer's Market.  The Inner Peace Festival was created with the intention of bringing consciousness and peace to the heart New Haven, unifying our community in one mind, one heart and one love — it is our way of contributing to peace in the world. How does this happen? The Inner Peace Festival will have music, yoga, blessings, kirtan, dancing, a drum circle, and many more activities, all to facilitate participants' experiencing peace inside and outside.  It is a one-of-a-kind event where EVERYTHING is a donation- every class and musician…every morsel of food and drink.  It is the BEST of NEW HAVEN shining through all the collaborators, striving to start a revolution of peace and justice, consciousness and collaboration, to ripple throughout New Haven and way beyond!

Join us for this timely and momentous event and be a part of the peace movement in New Haven!


The festivities will include:

~ Guitarist, John Shannon ~ 10:30 AM

~ Contra Dancing with Bill Fischer - 12 noon

~ Yoga in the park with:

Peg Oliveira representing 108 Monkeys ~ 11:30

Nancy Melillo of Fresh Yoga ~ 1:15

~ Drumming Circle with Mark Zarrillo ~ 10am

~ Kirtan with Andrew and Friends ~ 11am

Activities include:

~ Face painting

~ Labyrinth walk

~ Giant Peace Dove

~ Blessing Tent

~ Create a Mandala ~ Interactive activities by:

IBS Green

New Haven Land Trust

~ Refreshments compliments of:

Elm City Market

Green Well Organic Tea & Coffee

Judies European Bakery & Cafe

New Haven Center of Light

~ Raffle for sewing lessons from Neville's Fashion Design Studio

and a gift basket from Euphoria Salon

And much more!

group.name: Meditation & Inner Spirituality Group - New Haven

item.name: New Haven Inner Peace Festival
